210th Year of the Fifth Cycle, July 14

The spies have returned -----

MOTHER IS DEAD! How I knew it would come to this! My fool brother and
sister were unworthy to see her to her grave. It should have been I who
sat by her side in her final hours! I am putting my most trusted priest
in charge of the feeding. I must go to Shalewood now, myself. I know
what will be required to bring my brother here.
